titleStmt.title: [Englan]ds improvement, and seasonable advice to all gentlemen and farmers how to prepare the ground fit for sowing hemp and flax seed; the nature of it, with directions how to sow it, when ripe how to pull it, and preserve the seed when ripe: with directions for watering, breaking, swingling and preparing it fit to be hachell'd.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed in the year 1691. To be had at the booksellers in Westminster-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Copy cataloged has mutilated title page affecting first word of title; full title from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
